explains: v. 使确信，向……保证；确保，使确定；给……保险
wordGroup: assure of vt. 向...保证）；查明（使相信

sentences.en: She's perfectly safe, I can assure you.
sentences.cn: 我可以向你保证，她绝对安全。

sentences.en: Victory would assure a place in the finals.
sentences.cn: 胜利将确保能参加决赛。

sentences.en: Victory would assure them a place in the finals.
sentences.cn: 胜利将确保他们能参加决赛。
